meanings.definition: An organism with multiple sets of chromosomes derived from the same species.
meanings.sent1: The autopolyploid plant had extra sets of chromosomes from its own species.
meanings.sent2: Scientists studied the autopolyploid to understand its genetic makeup.
meanings.sent3: The autopolyploid potato was so full of chromosomes, it looked like a tiny chromosome factory.
meanings.sent4: Her love for gardening bloomed like an autopolyploid, with layers of care and dedication.
meanings.sent5: The autopolyploid fish shimmered with genetic diversity, a true marvel of nature.

meanings.definition: The process of an organism having more than two sets of chromosomes from the same species.
meanings.sent1: Autopolyploid formation can lead to unique genetic combinations in plants.
meanings.sent2: Understanding autopolyploidization is crucial in genetic research.
meanings.sent3: The autopolyploidization of the flower made it the talk of the botanical garden.
meanings.sent4: Her ideas multiplied like an autopolyploidization, creating a rich tapestry of thoughts.
meanings.sent5: The autopolyploidization of the tree brought forth a forest of possibilities.
